title: Daily reward didn't give me anything and I cant open my notifcations

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: Someone, please help me I have restarted my pc, used Full game repair and nothing has fixed this.

replies.body: Honestly it looks like you just don't have any current notifications to display. Mine looks and behaves the exact same way right now.
I couldn't open but I fixed it by reinstalling my game.
